Reference

Pins

Functions for pinning, finding, retrieving and sharing remote resources.

pin()

Pin Resource

pin_find()

Find Pin

pin_get()

Retrieve Pin

pin_info()

Pin Info

pin_reactive()

Reactive Pin

pin_remove()

Remove Pin

pin_versions()

Pin Versions

Boards

Functions for configuring remote storage lcoations, known as ‘boards’.

board_deregister()

Deregister Board

board_get()

Get Board

board_list()

List Boards

board_register()

Register Board

Aliases

Alias functions to help register boards.

board_register_azure()

Register Azure Board

board_register_datatxt()

Register Data TXT Board

board_register_gcloud()

Register Google Cloud Board

board_register_github()

Register GitHub Board

board_register_kaggle()

Register Kaggle Board

board_register_local()

Register Local Board

board_register_rsconnect()

Register RStudio Connect Board

board_register_s3()

Register S3 Board

Extensions

Functions for creating custom boards.

board_pin_create() board_initialize() board_pin_get() board_pin_remove() board_pin_find() board_pin_versions() board_browse()

Custom Boards

pin_preview() pin_load() pin_fetch() board_pin_store()

Custom Pins
